import React from 'react'; const Privacy = () => { return (

Privacy

Privacy Policy Last updated: September 12, 2024 Introduction Welcome to the Privacy Policy for A Send Text (referred to as "we," "us," or "our"). We offer a service that allows you to send text messages without needing email addresses or phone numbers. This policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and safeguard your personal data. Information We Collect We do not collect any of your personal information. All data, including your text and ID, is deleted within 20 minutes, so you can send messages worry-free. How We Use Your Information We may use your information to: Provide and enhance our services. Communicate with you about updates and offers. Ensure the security and integrity of our services. Data Sharing We may share data with trusted third parties to assist in delivering our services, as required by law, or with your consent. Your Rights Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or limit the processing of your personal data. Changes to This Policy We may update this privacy policy periodically and will inform you of any significant changes.

Hi! I'm the person behind SendTextAnywhere. I am constantly working to enhance this platform and improve your experience. Thank you for being part of our journey!

); }; export default Privacy;
